definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Master, Don't trust that ape. The brother monkey is deliberately trying to trick you by magic way.
sentences.chinese: 師傅不要信那猴頭，這是猴哥使的障眼法來騙您的。

sentences.english: The drug war is a smokescreen for the real agenda.
sentences.chinese: 毒品戰爭不過是真正意圖的障眼法罷了。

sentences.english: I think the best head fake of all time comes from Caitlin Kelleher.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲有史以來最好的障眼法是來自凱特琳。

sentences.english: The mars business is just a deception.
sentences.chinese: 登陸火星只是中國的障眼法。

sentences.english: Master, don't believe that monkey, He's treating.
sentences.chinese: 師傅不要信那猴頭，這是猴哥使的障眼法來騙您的。

definition: to hinder the eyesight/(fig.) to trick into not noticing/to blindfold
to fool people (idiom)/to pull the wool over people's eyes
to cross the sea by a trick (idiom)/to achieve one's aim by underhanded means
to threaten the east and strike to the west (idiom)/to create a diversion
a diversion/a feint attack to mislead the enemy
to lure the tiger from its domain in the mountains (idiom)/to lure an enemy away from his territory
lit. the cicada sheds its carapace (idiom); fig. to vanish leaving an empty shell/a crafty escape plan
